name: Magical Fable: The Princess of Light
name_original: Magical Fable: The Princess of Light
description:
This is a otome visual novel game with delicate artwork.

In the distant past, the races with magic founded the colonies in many places and then united the colonies into a country. There are four kinds of magic, fire, water, light, and dark. The races sustain the prosperity of this country by utilizing the magic they’re good at.
The major industries of the City of Fire is mining, gold and silver forging and weapons forging; The City of Water is a market renowned for agriculture and dairy; The City of Light is a well-known center for sacred churches and hospitals; The City of Dark is an assembly point for criminals, profiteers, murders, and arsonists, etc.
In order to learn how to govern this country, the princess of the country decides to pay a private visit to the country and learn the public life.

There are four characters in total in the game: butler, businessman, weapon craftsman, mysterious man.
